email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

I hope you're doing well. We are looking to charter a vessel for shipping 12,000 MT of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai under CIF terms. Could you please provide a suitable vessel and an initial freight quote?

Best regards,
Liam Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for your inquiry. We have the M/V OCEAN HORIZON available, which has a DWT of 65,000 and an LOA of 225m. The initial freight quote is USD 25 per metric tonne. The laycan dates are from October 10 to October 20. Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Sophia Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Rate Discussion
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

Thank you for the quick response. The rate of USD 25 per MT seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Could you possibly review this rate? Additionally, could you provide details on the demurrage rate and the expected loading window in Newcastle?

Looking forward to your revised offer.
Best regards,
Liam Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Liam,

Thank you for your feedback. Considering the current market, we can revise the freight quote to USD 23 per metric tonne. The demurrage rate is USD 12,000 per day, and the loading window in Newcastle is expected to be 3 days. Please let me know if this revised offer meets your requirements.

Best regards,
Sophia Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Acceptance
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

Thank you for the revised offer. We accept the rate of USD 23 per metric tonne. Please proceed with the necessary arrangements and provide us with the contract details.

Best regards,
Liam Carter
